basics.label: Platform Architect, Healthcare Incubation Lab (HIL)
basics.summary: A driven technology professional with software architecture and development background and a passion for Agile methodologies. I enjoy designing and developing platforms consisting of web applications and services that help businesses innovate and stay competitive.

work.name: Healthcare Incubation Lab (HIL)
work.summary: Premera Blue Cross is a not-for-profit healthcare insurance provider in the state of Washington, USA. The Healthcare Incubation Lab is an internal startup backed and funded by Premera Blue Cross.
highlights: Led and collaborated with enterprise solution delivery teams in all phases
Collaborated in design and development of an API platform
Architected, integrated and managed Okta IDaaS

work.name: Enterprise Architecture & IT Strategy
work.summary: The Enterprise Architecture and IT Strategy team at Premera designs the systems and solutions built and used at Premera Blue Cross and all of its subsidiaries.
highlights: Collaborated in the design and development of a telephony and analytics solution built using a complex orchestration of web services
Assisted various delivery teams with adopting Agile Scrum & Kanban practices

work.name: Research & Development
work.summary: PriceMetrix is a SaaS startup based in the financial district of Toronto, Ontario, Canada. PriceMetrix processes vast amounts of transaction-level data and provides business intelligence solutions to retail brokerages, commercial and investment banks in US & Canada.
highlights: Led development of a new flagship SaaS platform
Developed a highly available, mission critical web application

courses: Information Technology Infrastructure Library (ITIL) v3 Training
The Open Group Architecture Framework - TOGAF 9 Level 1 Training
